Package com.udeajobs.profile.profile_service.service

Class ProfileServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.udeajobs.profile.profile_service.service.ProfileServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
ProfileService
@Service public class ProfileServiceImpl extends Object implements ProfileService
Implementación del servicio de perfiles con toda la lógica de negocio.
